author: crossley
msg: Added docv20-to-docv13 transformation for howto-v20 documents.
Howto-v20 now properly handles a/@class=fork etc. attribute to enable
links to open in a new browser window.

author: ajith
msg: 1. Findnamespace implementation throws a NPE if there are no declared namespaces in the current elements. Fixed this by skipping the search in the current element if the namespaces map is null.

2. The setParent(null) caused the element to be completely built. The intention of the user when calling setparent with null is to remove the parent. Hence specialcased the setParent implementation for null.

author: bayard
msg: Archimedes Trajano offered another method for the class
